alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Tioga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:18PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Schuyler, Chemung, southwestern Tioga, southwestern Tompkins and central Bradford Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 518 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Catharine to near Franklindale. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chemung, Ithaca, Elmira, Southport, Barton, Horseheads, Sayre, Newfield, Waverly and Elmira Heights. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 54 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
